page.title: 13Farming
page.content: The most common thing farmed in our block is dairy and beef.In our area farming is popular,there are 14 farms and only two of these farms farm sheep. The farms are not all that big.The farm is Polsue Manner a 161 acres. The farms are quite old ,like one farm dates back to the Domesday Book. The land is very hilly in this area therefore the fields are quite small. Some farms are rented from the Tregothnan estate. Most farms sell their crops as a cash crop,(to get money for the rent).The farms aren't near any of the villages so they can't interfere with each other.All the farms are situated quite close to each other.One or two farms have bed and breakfast signs outside.There are 6 beef, 6 dairy and 2 sheep farms.
